name: The Molly Maguires
summary_text: In the Pennsylvanian coal mines of 1876, a group of Irish immigrant workers begin to retaliate against the cruelty of their work environment.

name: Monster Party
summary_text: Three young thieves infiltrate a Malibu dinner party.

name: The Motel Life
summary_text: A pair of working-class brothers flee their Reno Motel after getting involved in a fatal hit-and-run accident.

name: Blonde and Blonder
summary_text: Comic mayhem ensues when two lovely blondes, Dee and Dawn, are mistaken as international mob killers.

name: Picking Up the Pieces
summary_text: A small New Mexican village discovers a severed hand that is considered a miracle of God, when it actually belongs to a murdered spouse with a husband in search of it.

name: Esteros
summary_text: Two boyhood chums, separated soon after sexually awakening together, re-meet as young men with unspoken sexual tensions lying between them.

name: Asylum
summary_text: Six college students discover their dorm was once an insane asylum that conducted gruesome lobotomies on its teenage inmates during the 1930's.

name: Moonlight and Valentino
summary_text: A young widow still grieving over the death of her husband finds herself being comforted by a local housepainter.

name: First Name: Carmen
summary_text: A woman involved with a terrorist group becomes dangerously close to the police officer guarding the bank they plan to rob.

name: Garazh
summary_text: Meeting of the garage cooperative must exclude four own members because of a new highway's building. After the meeting it becomes clear that the exit door is closed by one of the members, who requires an equitable solution.

name: Blood Glacier
summary_text: Scientists working in the Austrian Alps discover that a glacier is leaking a liquid that appears to be affecting local wildlife.

name: Mouna Ragam
summary_text: Divya, a woman grieving over the death of her lover, is convinced into an arranged marriage with Chandra Kumar. Over a year the couple attempt to adjust to each other's presence and live with each other.

name: Broken Lance
summary_text: The saga of the Devereaux rancher family, set in 1880's Arizona.

name: Nightmare
summary_text: A mental patient embarks on a murder spree upon escaping from an institution.

name: The Whip and the Body
summary_text: The ghost of a sadistic nobleman attempts to rekindle his romance with his terrorized, masochistic former lover, who is unwillingly affianced to his brother.

name: Rubbeldiekatz
summary_text: An actor's career takes a "Tootsie"-like turn when he lets himself be cast as a woman in a movie.

name: Tokyo Twilight
summary_text: Two sisters find out the existence of their long-lost mother, but the younger cannot take the truth of being abandoned as a child.

name: Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell
summary_text: Baron Frankenstein works with a mental patient to reanimate the dead.

name: 5 Card Stud
summary_text: The players in an ongoing poker game are being mysteriously killed off, one by one.

name: Clemency
summary_text: As she prepares to execute another inmate, Bernadine must confront the psychological and emotional demons her job creates, ultimately connecting her to the man she is sanctioned to kill.

name: Kali
summary_text: A young wife hopes to convince her husband to change his short-tempered attitude toward life, but an incident on a remote highway may finally decide the matter.

name: The Pass
summary_text: A romantic interaction between two young footballers profoundly affects one of them throughout the rest of his life and career.

name: Dancing at Lughnasa
summary_text: Five unmarried sisters make the most of their simple existence in rural Ireland in the 1930s.

name: Carry on Doctor
summary_text: Dr Kilmore is sacked after being discovered in a compromising position on the roof of the nurses' home. The patients are determined not to lose him, and so take on the might of the "cutting" Dr Tinkle and the overpowering Matron.

name: It Should Happen to You
summary_text: When a young woman with dreams of fame rents a billboard to advertise herself, her life changes overnight.

name: Carefree
summary_text: A psychiatrist falls in love with the woman he's supposed to be nudging into marriage with someone else.

name: The Whole Wide World
summary_text: In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.

name: Girls Against Boys
summary_text: After a series of bad experiences with men, Shae teams up with her co-worker, Lu, who has a simple, deadly way of dealing with the opposite sex.

name: Deep in the Valley
summary_text: A mysterious video booth transports two friends to an alternate reality straight out of a pornographic film.

name: The Power of Few
summary_text: Religious conspiracy collides with urban crime in a story told from multiple perspectives.

name: El Lobo
summary_text: In the 1970s, Spanish dictatorship's secret service recruited a construction worker to infiltrate the Basque separatist underground and become a mole for the fascist state.

name: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
summary_text: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

name: Bernie
summary_text: A 30 year old orphan finds his life's official version hard to swallow. His parents couldn't possibly have abandoned him in a trash can as a baby. No, they were victims of a mafia plot and today, if they're still alive, they need his help.

name: Zandalee
summary_text: Thierry's wife Zandalee married the poet, he once was. Taking over his dad's company in New Orleans gives him stress and impotence. Thierry meets his high school buddy Johnny at a bachelor party. The painter Johnny can satisfy Zandalee.

name: Alien from L.A.
summary_text: A nerdy teenage girl goes looking for her missing archaeologist father, and stumbles into a strange subterranean civilization.

name: Lancelot of the Lake
summary_text: King Arthur learns about his wife's, Queen Guinevere, affair with Lancelot, who at the same time remains loyal to the king, particularly after Arthur's traitorous nephew Mordred commits an attempt on his life.

name: The Last Time I Saw Paris
summary_text: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.

name: Get Santa
summary_text: A father and son who team up to save Christmas once they discover Santa Claus sleeping in their garage after crashing his sleigh and finding himself on the run from the police.

name: Raavanan
summary_text: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.

name: Linda Linda Linda
summary_text: A music group of girls need to learn to play a song before the school festival.

name: Ayitha Ezhuthu
summary_text: Three men and their accidental meeting on Napier Bridge will change their lives forever.

name: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
summary_text: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.

name: Breakout
summary_text: A bush pilot is hired for fifty thousand dollars to go to Mexico to free an innocent prisoner.

name: Strange But True
summary_text: A woman surprises the family of her deceased boyfriend by telling them she's pregnant with his child.

name: Love Is the Devil: Study for a Portrait of Francis Bacon
summary_text: Biography of British painter Francis Bacon focuses on his relationship with his lover, George Dyer, a former small time crook.

name: Hero and the Terror
summary_text: Danny was lucky 3 years ago at the arrest of Terror, a serial killer of young women. Danny's about to be dad, when Terror escapes prison and is back killing. Will Danny get lucky this time?

name: Georgy Girl
summary_text: A traditional girl (Lynn Redgrave) resists the advances of a swinger (James Mason) who wants her ashis mistress in 1960s London.

name: Demetrius and the Gladiators
summary_text: In first-century Rome, Christian slave Demetrius is sent to fight in the gladiatorial arena and Emperor Caligula seeks Jesus' robe for its alleged magical powers.

name: Rampant
summary_text: Lee Chung is a Prince of Joseon, but he has been taken hostage to the Qing Dynasty.

name: Shinboru
summary_text: A man wakes up in a white room empty other than buttons on the walls, he must find out which button to push to get what he wants.

name: The Dark Side of the Heart
summary_text: Oliveiro is a young poet living in Buenos Aires where sometimes he has to sell his ideas to an advertising agency to make a living or exchange his poems for a steak. In Montevideo, he meets...                See full summary »

name: The Last Command
summary_text: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin of the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

name: Little Accidents
summary_text: In a small American town still living in the shadow of a terrible coal mine accident, the disappearance of a teenage boy draws together a surviving miner, the lonely wife of a mine executive, and a local boy in a web of secrets.

name: Last Cab to Darwin
summary_text: When Rex, a Broken Hill cab driver, is told he doesn't have long to live, he sets out on an epic journey to Darwin in a bid to die on his own terms.

name: Offender
summary_text: Justice needs to be served at Britain's most notorious young offenders institute.

name: Ben 10: Race Against Time
summary_text: Ben Tennyson returns home from summer vacation only to discover that a rapidly aging alien criminal named, Eon, is planning to use an ancient alien artifact to destroy Bellwood.

name: Cleopatra
summary_text: The man-hungry Queen of Egypt leads Julius Caesar and Mark Antony astray, amid scenes of DeMillean splendor.

name: Hate Story
summary_text: After a powerful businessman has her baby forcefully aborted, Kaavya Krishna uses her body as a sexual weapon to destroy his empire, brick by brick.

name: The Public Eye
summary_text: In the early 1940s, an infamous New York paparazzo gets an assignment from a club owner to do a background search on a mysterious gangster, which leads him down a very dangerous path.

name: Buster
summary_text: Based on the story of Ronald Christopher "Buster" Edwards (Phil Collins), one of the thieves involved in "The Great Train Robbery" of 1963.

name: Scream and Scream Again
summary_text: A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.

name: Raintree County
summary_text: A student falls in love with a Southern belle, but their relationship is complicated by her troubled past and the on-set of the Civil War.

name: Chromeskull: Laid to Rest 2
summary_text: "ChromeSkull" is the sequel to the 2009 horror hit "Laid to Rest." It brings back ChromeSkull, who barely escaped death in the first movie and is hell-bent on continuing where he left off.....                See full summary »

name: Stasis
summary_text: After a night out of partying Ava wakes up and sneaks back home only to find that somebody's already in her bed and they look exactly like her. Ava learns that a time-traveling fugitive has stolen her body and she is now a ghost and invisible to everyone.

name: Clubbed
summary_text: An underworld drama set in the early 1980s, about a lonely factory worker whose life is transformed when he becomes a nightclub doorman.

name: Sultan
summary_text: Portrayal of a young depressed Turkish widow in the slums whose infinite dignity alone looks after her orphan kids is depicted by the son of the town sheriff, who is in love with her.

name: Devchata
summary_text: Several romance stories - part funny, part sadly - set in a remote logging camp.

name: Repmånad eller Hur man gör pojkar av män
summary_text: It's time for Jonsson to return to his old regiment to rehearse what he learned during conscription a few years ago. He meets his old friends, platoon leader Larsson and the music loving ...                See full summary »

name: The Great Lie
summary_text: After a newlywed's husband apparently dies in a plane crash, she discovers that her rival for his affections is now pregnant with his child.

name: Malicious
summary_text: A young college professor and his pregnant wife unwittingly release a malevolent entity with murderous intentions.

name: Kindergarten Cop 2
summary_text: Assigned to recover sensitive stolen data, a gruff FBI agent goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher, but the school's liberal, politically correct environment is more than he bargained for.

name: The Funhouse Massacre
summary_text: Six of the world's scariest psychopaths escape from a local Asylum and proceed to unleash terror on the unsuspecting crowd of a Halloween Funhouse, whose themed mazes are inspired by their various reigns of terror.

name: My Summer in Provence
summary_text: Lea, Adrian, and their little brother Theo, born deaf, go on holiday in Provence with their grandfather, Paul "Oliveron" they never met because of a family quarrel. Unfortunately, it is not...                See full summary »

name: Summer Camp
summary_text: Four American counsellors at a European summer camp must deal with the outbreak of a rage-inducing plague that starts in the animals.

name: The Other Son
summary_text: Two young men, one Israeli and one Palestinian, discover they were accidentally switched at birth.

name: Rasputin
summary_text: HBO biopic about the infamous "mad monk" Rasputin from the court of Czar Nicholas II in Russia.

name: Extremities
summary_text: A woman takes revenge on the man who invades her home and tries to rape her.

name: Father's Little Dividend
summary_text: Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter's marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather.

name: Viva Maria!
summary_text: Somewhere in Central America in 1907: Maria II is the daughter of an Irish terrorist. After her father's death, she meets Maria I, a singer in a circus. She decides to stay with the circus,...                See full summary »

name: Breathing Room
summary_text: Thrown naked into a desolate room with thirteen strangers, Tonya discovers that she is the final contestant in a deadly game. Restrained by lethal electronic collars, the players must ...                See full summary »

name: Manuale d'amore
summary_text: Four intertwined episodes on the joys and sorrows of love.

name: Fat Pizza
summary_text: The life at a suburban Sydney pizzeria.

name: Paprika
summary_text: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

name: Hanum & Rangga: Faith & The City
summary_text: A love story about a dentist's struggle with her husband.

name: Beats
summary_text: Two teenage boys in Scotland in 1994, best friends with no control over their lives, risk everything to attend an illegal rave, hoping for the best night of their boring lives.

name: Jesus Christ Superstar Live in Concert
summary_text: A live musical recounting the final days of Jesus Christ and those around him.

name: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
summary_text: Ram falls in love with Sona, who lives on the fields of Punjab. He follows her to her farm, where her elder brother challenges him to produce more seed on their fields. If he wins, he will be allowed to marry her.

name: Hansel & Gretel Get Baked
summary_text: A brother and sister battle a witch who lures teenagers into her suburban home with her special blend of marijuana where she then proceeds to kill and eat them to maintain her youth and beauty.

name: He Died with a Felafel in His Hand
summary_text: A nightmare chase through hell in a never-ending, unrequited daisy chain of desire...

name: The Long Walk Home
summary_text: Two women, black and white, in 1955 Montgomery Alabama, must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott led by Martin Luther King.

name: Caliber 9
summary_text: A former gangster is forced to resume his old lifestyle when his violent, jealous ex-colleagues and the police believe that he knows the location of a stolen cache of $300,000.

name: The Young Poisoner's Handbook
summary_text: This film is based on a true story about a British teenager who allegedly poisoned family, friends, and co-workers. Graham is highly intelligent, but completely amoral. He becomes ...                See full summary »

name: Close to Eden
summary_text: A curious friendship develops between Gombo, a young Mongolian shepherd living with his wife and family in a hut, deep in the wilderness of the steppes, and Sergei, a Russian worker whose truck breaks down not far from Gombo's hut.

name: Three on a Match
summary_text: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

name: Sudani from Nigeria
summary_text: Story of an African football player and a local football club manager from Malappuram, Kerala.

name: A Girl Cut in Two
summary_text: A black comedy centered around a TV weather girl and the two very different men who pursue her.

name: Kilukkam
summary_text: Nandini is an illegitimate child who comes to Ooty in search of her father. She meets Joji, a tourist guide, and pretends to be mentally unstable in order to get shelter in his house.

name: The Black Cat
summary_text: A professor with the psychic ability to communicate with the dead uses his powers on his pet cat in order to take vengeance upon his enemies.

name: One Way Passage
summary_text: A terminally ill woman and a debonair murderer facing execution meet and fall in love on a trans-Pacific crossing, each without knowing the other's secret.

name: Sand Castles
summary_text: In rural Indiana, Noah and his impoverished family wrestle with the mysterious return of his now mute sister Lauren, who was kidnapped and held captive for over a decade.

name: Shor in the City
summary_text: Various residents and career-criminals face challenges in crime-laden Mumbai.

name: Escaflowne: The Movie
summary_text: A grim retelling of the television series "The Vision of Escaflowne".

name: Tutti i colori del buio
summary_text: A woman recovering from a car accident in which she lost her unborn child finds herself pursued by a coven of devil worshipers.

name: Puff, Puff, Pass
summary_text: Tired of being on the wagon, two stoners get voluntarily mixed up in the plot to rip off a shady figure known as Mr. Big.

name: Saint Frances
summary_text: After an accidental pregnancy turned abortion, a deadbeat nanny finds an unlikely friendship with the six-year old she's charged with protecting.

name: God's Not Dead: A Light in Darkness
summary_text: Pastor Dave responds to the unimaginable tragedy of having his church, located on the grounds of the local university, burned down.

name: The Gospel of John
summary_text: The story of Jesus' life as told by the apostle John, narrated by Christopher Plummer.

name: Go Figure
summary_text: A teenager dreams of becoming a champion ice-skater, and soon discovers a top Russian instructor is working at a nearby private school.

name: Final Exam
summary_text: A psycho killer shows up on college campus to slash up pretty co-eds and dumb jocks.

name: Freak Show
summary_text: Follows the story of teenager Billy Bloom who, despite attending an ultra conservative high school, makes the decision to run for homecoming queen.

name: Dukhless
summary_text: A story about things that are really important in life.

name: Suwarôteiru
summary_text: The struggles of a group of immigrant outcasts living in an alternative-future, xenophobic Japanese metropolis.

name: Lao pao er
summary_text: A well respected man residing in what's left of old-Beijing attempts to exonerate his son from his wrongdoings with his own methods and beliefs.

name: Turtles Forever
summary_text: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles meet their match -- Literally! The modern, gritty Ninja Turtles must team up with their classic cartoon counterparts to stop two Shredders and their plans of multi-dimensional scale.

name: The Owl and the Pussycat
summary_text: A stuffy author enters into an explosive relationship with his neighbor, a foul-mouthed, freewheeling prostitute.

name: A Night in Old Mexico
summary_text: After being forced to sell his family ranch to developers, a financially strapped, but proud senior citizen, and his estranged grandson, find themselves targeted by drug dealers in search of a missing money bag.

name: Switching Channels
summary_text: A television news chief courts his anchorwoman ex-wife with an eleventh-hour story.

name: Lost in London
summary_text: Within the course of one night, Woody Harrelson finds himself in a misadventure in London that winds him up in jail.

name: Mandingo
summary_text: An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.

name: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
summary_text: A poor, uneducated mountain girl leaves her cabin in search of respect, a wealthy husband, and a better life in this fictionalized biopic of Margaret "Molly" Brown, who survived the 1912 sinking of the RMS Titanic.

name: In the Good Old Summertime
summary_text: In turn-of-the century America, Andrew and Veronica are co-workers in a music shop who dislike one another during business hours but unwittingly carry on an anonymous romance through the mail.

name: Leprechaun Returns
summary_text: The Leprechaun returns once again, when a group of girls unwillingly awaken him after they tear down a cabin so that they can build a new sorority house.

name: Wolves at the Door
summary_text: Four friends are murdered in their home for no reason by four members of the Manson Family.

name: The Last Survivors
summary_text: A teenage girl fights to protect the last working well in a drought-stricken valley from a greedy water baron.

name: Eve no jikan
summary_text: In a not too distant future, a young man's outlook on his home android begins to change after tracking the android's behavioral log to a mysterious cafe.

name: Odd Girl Out
summary_text: A teenager is bullied by her former friends when they discover that she has a crush on the same boy as the most popular girl in school does.

name: Pride and Honour
summary_text: An honest and decorated police officer is arrested on charges of mass murder and trapped in a corrupt political system, where he finds himself sinking in deep trouble.

name: Where Hands Touch
summary_text: A rites of passage story of a bi-racial teen struggling for survival in Nazi Germany.

name: Classmates
summary_text: College classmates meet for a 10-year reunion, which does not go as smoothly as planned. Love is discovered, friendships are broken and secrets about tragic events in the past are revealed.

name: Beremennyy
summary_text: A story of the pregnant man

name: A Horrible Way to Die
summary_text: An escaped murderer is in pursuit of his ex-girlfriend, who has fled to start a new life in a small town.

name: Chronicle of an Escape
summary_text: The goalkeeper of a little-known soccer team is kidnapped by a Argentinean government squad and sent to a detention center. After months of torture, he plots his escape with three other young men.

name: The Sea Wolf
summary_text: After being fished out of the sea by a sailer, three fugitives find themselves prisoners of the ship's brutal skipper who refuses to put them ashore and they hatch an escape plan during a crew mutiny.

name: Nos jours heureux
summary_text: A genuine and often funny depiction of the relationships between monitors and children in a summer vacation camp. From romance to friendship, dancing to fighting, this French movie bring back good souvenirs of childhood.

name: Gol Krali
summary_text: Said funny events that have to be engaged to endear himself to the beloved players.

name: Why Don't You Just Die!
summary_text: Andrei, a detective and the world's most horrible father, brings together a terrible group of people in his apartment: his resentful actress daughter, an angry thug, and a cheated cop. Each one of them has a reason to want revenge..

name: Nana
summary_text: A chance encounter between two girls of the same name, "Nana," triggers a series of events and relationships.

name: Mountains of the Moon
summary_text: The legendary true-story of Capt. Richard Francis Burton and Lt. John Hanning Speke's tumultuous expedition to find the source of the Nile river.

name: Jack Frost
summary_text: The Groundhog tells the story of how, for once, Jack Frost became human, and helped a knight win his lady love.

name: The V.I.P.s
summary_text: As fog delays departure for a group of travellers bound for New York City, they wait at the lounge of London's Heathrow airport, with each passenger at a moment of crisis in his or her life.

name: Oppam
summary_text: A blind man tries to protect a girl from a psycho killer.

name: Maari
summary_text: Maari, a goon with a love for pigeon racing, must challenge the police corruption in his town.

name: The Solitude of Prime Numbers
summary_text: Non-linearly follows two kids, rejected by their peers, who become friends. They separate later in life and dedicate to their careers. Still, they feel as if something is missing.

name: Hot Pursuit
summary_text: Dan arrives too late for his girlfriend's family's plane to the Caribbean. He gets the next. Once there, Dan's hot pursuit of his girlfriend includes 3 friendly locals, a dubious yacht skipper, corrupt police, hijacker, pirates etc.

name: Sunset Song
summary_text: The daughter of a Scottish farmer comes of age in the early 1900s.

name: L'Homme Qui Voulait Vivre sa Vie
summary_text: A successful Paris lawyer is forced to re-invent his life after he makes a fatal mistake.

name: Dean Spanley
summary_text: Set in Edwardian England where upper lips are always stiff and men from the Colonies are not entirely to be trusted, Fisk Senior has little time or affection for his son, but when the pair visit an eccentric Indian, they start a strange journey that eventually allows the old man to find his heart.

name: Gekijouban Psycho-Pass
summary_text: In this sequel to Psycho-Pass TV show, Inspector Tsunemori is sent to a neighboring war-torn nation, where the Sibyl System is being introduced as an experiment, to find Shinya Kogami, her former enforcer who went rogue three years ago.

name: #Horror
summary_text: Six preadolescent girls face a night of terror when the compulsive addiction of an online social media game turns a moment of cyber bullying into a night of insanity.

name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
summary_text: A young couple inherits an old mansion inhabited by small demon-like creatures who are determined to make the wife one of their own.

name: Night Nurse
summary_text: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

name: Playmobil: The Movie
summary_text: Animated feature film inspired by the Playmobil brand toys.

name: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
summary_text: A sarcastic playwright in LA gets new neighbors - single mom and 8 y.o. girl. His wife wants kids and babysits the girl. He doesn't want kids yet plays with her to find out how children talk - for his play. Paternal instincts?

name: Suchwiin bulmyeong
summary_text: Romances end in blood and the frail hopes of individuals are torn apart in a vile karmic continuity of colonialism, civil war and occupation. After surviving Japanese colonization, Korea ...                See full summary »

name: Boys
summary_text: Patty Vare falls off a horse and is found unconscious by preparatory school student John Baker. He takes her to his dormitory. As he quickly discovers, she is hiding from something. For ...                See full summary »

name: Gen
summary_text: A suicide case is informed to the police from a mental hospital in a rocky district. Two policemen comes to hospital to investigate the case. In the same morning, Dr. Deniz comes to ...                See full summary »

name: Safe Sex
summary_text: A satire of life in modern Greece, presented through a series of different stories about sex. We see several couples and their relation with sex in parallel stories that come together in a hilarious way as the film progresses.

name: Gun City
summary_text: In 1921 a tough cop is sent from Madrid to Barcelona to locate stolen military weaponry.

name: Bhoot
summary_text: When a married couple moves into a flat that is haunted by a spirit, a series of inexplicable experiences drive the wife to near madness. Now, the husband must protect his wife to save their marriage.

name: Pippi on the Run
summary_text: Fed up with their strict parents, Tommy and Annika run away from home, with their friend Pippi Longstocking to look after them in their long trek.

name: Amreeka
summary_text: A drama centered on the trials and tribulations of a proud Palestinian Christian immigrant single mother and her teenage son in small town Indiana.

name: The Big Trail
summary_text: Breck Coleman leads hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out West.

name: Chto tvoryat muzhchiny!
summary_text: Four friends decide to participate in the game organized by extravagant billionaire. The winner will be the one who seduces most girls during the competition.

name: Himlen är oskyldigt blå
summary_text: Coming of age film that takes place in the Swedish archipelago during 70s about young Martin (Bill Skarsgård) who gets a summer job working at a hotel. The hotel manager Gösta (Peter Dalle)...                See full summary »

name: Beautiful Kate
summary_text: A writer reawakens his childhood trauma from the past when he returns home, at the request of his estranged sister, to grieve their father's impending death.

name: Tanner Hall
summary_text: Tanner Hall is a vivid peek into the private world of an all-girls boarding school. In a cozy, but run-down New England, the knot of adolescent complexity is unraveled through the coming-of-age stories of four teenage girls.

name: Man with a Million
summary_text: As part of a bet, two aristocrats offer a penniless American a loan, without telling him that the amount is £1,000,000 in the form of a single banknote.

name: Dabbe: Zehr-i Cin
summary_text: Dilek, a housewife suddenly starts to feel presence of something abnormal in a specific room in their house. Though her husband, Omer refuses to agree with her but situation become worse. ...                See full summary »

name: Aakrosh
summary_text: The Central Bureau of Investigation deputes two officers to investigate the disappearance of three medical students, which they believe to be an incident of 'honour killing' in a small, closed community.

name: iCarly: iGo to Japan
summary_text: Carly, Sam, and Freddie are thrilled when their web show is nominated for a prestigious iWeb Award in the "Best Comedy Web Show" category.

name: Betsy's Wedding
summary_text: The very different Betsy and Jake are getting married. They want a small wedding but their dads want to give a big.

name: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
summary_text: As part of a sorority ritual, pledges and their male companions steal a trophy from a bowling alley; unbeknownst to them, it contains a devilish imp who makes their lives a living Hell.

name: A Return to Salem's Lot
summary_text: A man and his son vacation to the quiet vampire populated town of Salem's Lot.

name: The Terrorizers
summary_text: A metaphysical mystery about the lives of three couples in Taipei that continually intersect over a span of several weeks.

name: Los santos inocentes
summary_text: Spain, 1960s. People from a very poor family work in the country, at the service of a rich family of landowners...

name: We Die Young
summary_text: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington, D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

name: Keep an Eye Out
summary_text: Police officers at a station must solve a murder case.

name: Nine Miles Down
summary_text: A security expert is sent to a remote scientific camp to investigate strange things that are happening.

name: Grey Owl
summary_text: The story of the life and work of the Canadian fur trapper-turned-conservationist who claimed to be an aboriginal North American.

name: Masterminds
